display_long_description:
Gripper's has jumped to VR with over 40 challenging puzzles. Can you get to the treasure that lies at the end.

# Puzzles include
- Using blocks to block enemy line of sight

- Shooting enemies and using them to travel over water as a raft

- Teleporting blocks, the player and other objects to solve puzzles

- Collecting all the keys before you can get to the exit of each level
[media]
# Features Included

- All new VR controls, zoom in and out of the action to see the world from a new angle

- Inspired by a classic video game

- 40+ puzzles to solve

- Cute characters

- Fun story

- Solve puzzles with little hand holding

- Free puzzle updates and modes(more puzzles post launch)

[media]
